summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Image Search feature with CC-licensed sources. All 19 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI tests passed - all filter buttons present, search functionality working, images displayed from multiple sources (Unsplash, Pexels, Wikimedia). Pixabay API key not configured but handled gracefully.

minor.issue: Pixabay API key not configured (PIXABAY_API_KEY empty in .env) - Pixabay results not returned

action_items: Optional: Add PIXABAY_API_KEY to backend/.env to enable Pixabay image source
context_for_next_testing_agent: Image Search feature fully tested and working. Backend endpoint /api/images/search returns results from Unsplash, Pexels, and Wikimedia Commons. Photo filter returns photos from all sources. Illustration filter returns illustrations from Wikimedia. Vector filter returns SVG vectors from Wikimedia. All images have proper CC license information. Source filters (Pexels, Unsplash, Wikimedia) work correctly. Pixabay not configured (API key empty).

backend_image_search_api.basic_search: PASS - Returns images from multiple sources (Unsplash, Pexels, Wikimedia)
backend_image_search_api.multiple_sources: PASS - Sources returned: unsplash, pexels, wikimedia
backend_image_search_api.photo_filter_sources: PASS - Photos from Unsplash, Pexels, Wikimedia
backend_image_search_api.illustration_filter: PASS - Returns illustration-type images from Wikimedia
backend_image_search_api.vector_filter: PASS - Returns vector/SVG images from Wikimedia
backend_image_search_api.license_info: PASS - All images have valid CC/free licenses
backend_image_search_api.wikimedia_cc_licenses: PASS - Wikimedia images have CC BY/CC BY-SA/CC0 licenses
backend_image_search_api.wikimedia_only_filter: PASS - source=wikimedia returns only Wikimedia results
backend_image_search_api.pexels_only_filter: PASS - source=pexels returns only Pexels results
backend_image_search_api.unsplash_only_filter: PASS - source=unsplash returns only Unsplash results
backend_image_search_api.image_data_structure: PASS - All required fields present (id, url, thumbnail, title, photographer, license, image_type)
backend_image_search_api.image_urls_valid: PASS - All URLs are valid HTTP/HTTPS
backend_image_search_api.pagination_info: PASS - Returns page, per_page, total, total_pages, has_next, has_prev
backend_image_search_api.pagination_page_2: PASS - Page 2 returns different results than page 1

frontend_image_search_ui.type_filter_buttons: PASS - All Images, Photos, Illustrations, Vectors buttons present with icons
frontend_image_search_ui.source_filter_buttons: PASS - All Sources, Pexels, Unsplash, Pixabay, Wikimedia buttons present
frontend_image_search_ui.search_input: PASS - Search input with data-testid present
frontend_image_search_ui.find_button: PASS - Find button with data-testid present
frontend_image_search_ui.search_results: PASS - 50 image cards displayed after search
frontend_image_search_ui.source_badges: PASS - Source badges (Unsplash, Pexels, Wikimedia) visible on cards
frontend_image_search_ui.free_badge: PASS - 'Free' badge displayed on all images
frontend_image_search_ui.license_info_banner: PASS - '100% Free to Use' banner with CC license info displayed
frontend_image_search_ui.photo_filter_click: PASS - Photo filter button clickable and triggers search
frontend_image_search_ui.illustration_filter_click: PASS - Illustration filter button clickable and triggers search
frontend_image_search_ui.vector_filter_click: PASS - Vector filter button clickable and triggers search
frontend_image_search_ui.wikimedia_source_filter: PASS - Wikimedia source filter returns only Wikimedia images

api_sources_status.unsplash: WORKING - API key configured, returns photos
api_sources_status.pexels: WORKING - API key configured, returns photos
api_sources_status.wikimedia: WORKING - No API key required, returns photos/illustrations/vectors with CC licenses
